name: Interface GaugeMonitorMBean
text: Exposes the remote management interface of the gauge monitor MBean.

methods.description: Gets the derived gauge for the specified MBean.
Gets the derived gauge timestamp for the specified MBean.

Sets the low notification's on/off switch value.
